EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: KRA Submission Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Goal__c.Resource__c},
We are pleased to inform you that your KRA has been successfully submitted for review to your mentor.
Thank you for your proactive approach to setting and aligning your goals with the mentorship program. Your dedication contributes significantly to our shared success.
Best Regards,
Cloud Peritus Team
